description:
Do you know the story of the almighty god Zeus? Now you can discover it as you advance in the game with fun challenges that will test your skills.

-Discover the story of Zeus
-Build strong relationships
-Create alliances
-Travel to other locations
-Transform into animals
-Ensure your reign with your offspring
-Rescue your siblings

Do you get into the history of Zeus?
name: Zeus: God of Lightning
intro: Discover the legendary story of Zeus in this fun narrative game, as you complete all the missions. You will have to secure the reign, while you travel and rescue your brothers.
